description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5pjm4","text":"The SARS-CoV-2 responsible for the ongoing COVID pandemic reveals particular evolutionary dynamics and an extensive polymorphism, mainly in Spike protein. Monitoring the S protein mutations is crucial for successful controlling measures and detect variants that can evade vaccine immunity. Even after the costs reduction imposed by the pandemic, the new generation sequencing methodologies remain unavailable to many scientific groups. Therefore, to support the urgent surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 S protein, this work describes a protocol for complete nucleotide sequencing of the S protein using the Sanger technique. Thus, any laboratory with experience in sequencing can adopt this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"bltrd","text":"This protocol works well with recent extracted RNA samples, ideally with ct values lower than 20.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"es2hv","text":"Agarose gel Electrophoresis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jaki","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7re0q","text":"Dissolve agarose in 1.X TAE Buffer (40 mM Tris-acetate, 1 mM EDTA) to a final concentration of 1.5% agarose.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pp1a","text":"Heat the solution in a microwave and let it cool at room temperature.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6boie","text":"Apply the agarose gel to the casting tray with the appropriate well comb and let it solidify.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c5c6","text":" Mix 5 µL of PCR product with 5µL of loading buffer and 1µL Blue Green Loading dye I (LGC Biotecnologia), apply it to the gel, and run the electrophoresis at 120V.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44s8c","text":"Visualize the gel with UV Transilluminator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7br7s","text":"Preparing Samples for sequencing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dmu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fphfj","text":"Sequencing procedures are performed according to BigDye™ Terminator v3.1 Cycle Sequencing Kit (Applied Biosystems) guidelines.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l0et","text":"Measure DNA Concentration with a nanodrop spectrophotometer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6ir5","text":"Dilute template to 200 ng/µl with nuclease-free water ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqt07","text":"Dilute primers to 1 µM with nuclease-free water. Only one primer is used for each sequencing reaction, leading to two reactions per sample. Each reaction will need 1µl of diluted primer.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33qnt","text":"Label and ship the samples and primers according to the sequencing service provider guidelines.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a11pi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11th9","text":"sequencing reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkdrh","text":"BigDye™ Terminator 3.1 Ready Reaction Mix   -    8 µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98jg3","text":"primer (1 µM)                                                         -    6.4 µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e48tb","text":"Template (200ng)                                                  -    2 µL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsnbh","text":"Deionized water (RNase/DNase-free)  to          -    20 µL              ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vqpi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnq6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ejcj","text":"sequencing cycle:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aes7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ojfu","text":"96°C    1 min          Incubation            | 1 cycle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nd10","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fts91","text":"96 °C  10 s\t        Denaturation \t|","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8emh0","text":"50 °C  05 s\t        Annealing\t        |  25 cycles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh3of","text":"60 °C  4 min     \tExtension\t        |","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3igm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clfgc","text":"  4 °C   ∞            \t                                | 1 cycle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amm4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1csdh","text":"Sequence analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9sjs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hnc2","text":"Upon receiving the electropherograms, edit them with proper programs like chromas or Bioedit.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77cbn","text":"For better editing accuracy, align the forward sequence with the reverse complement of the reverse sequence.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnsnp","text":"Use BLAST search to confirm if the sequenced product corresponds to the desired target.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2asno","text":"Create contigs by aligning the planned overlaps between each target fragment  and form one consensus sequence covering the full ORF of SARS-CoV-2 Spike protein ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"735r8","text":"Edited sequences can now be analyzed with the CoVsurver mutations app, provided by GISAID, to trace the mutation patterns of each sample and study their effects on protein structure.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej03","text":"Sequences can also be deposited in the GISAID database of SARS-CoV-2.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Sanger sequencing of SARS-CoV-2 Spike protein

versions.title: Sanger sequencing of SARS-CoV-2 Spike protein
